title: "Software & Data"

The Avisblatt project makes data from Switzerland's first advertising journal available under a Creative Commons license and publishes open source software to facilitate analysis and reproduce analysis of these data. 


## Data: Machine Friendly, OCR'd Ad Level Text Data

- GitHub: https://github.com/avisblatt/avisdata
- Zenodo: [![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/599301403.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/599301403)


## Software:

- the avisblatt R package Read & Process Data from Printed Markets - The Basel Avisblatt (1729-1845): https://github.com/Avisblatt/avisblatt
